WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
I downloaded last SVN version (92409).
Reader factory doesn't read anymore XLT and XLTX files.
PHPExcel_IOFactory::createReaderForFile() has changed.
 
PHP code: 
$objPHPExcel = PHPExcel_IOFactory::load('myfile.xltx');
 
Temporarely, I add 'xltx' in case instruction with 'xlsx' and 'xlt' with 'xls'.
 
Could you correct it please ?
Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Reader factory doesn't read anymore XLTX and XLT files

Comments.Message:
Hi Mark,
Do you have news ?
Thank you.

Fixed (as indicated in the Work Item Details summary on the right of this view) scheduled for the 1.7.8 production release (which should be this weekend or early next week) code is in the develop branch on gitbub

Sorry Mark.
On my screen realease displays 'Unassigned'.
How I can download code which is on gitbub ?
Download proposed is 92409 version code.
Thanks

Using git (you can download for your platform of preferences from a whole host of places) and there's plenty of instructions and tutorials.

The url to clone is https://github.com/PHPOffice/PHPExcel.git

Thank you,,
I follow PHPExcel on gitbub.
Thank you Mark, this issue can be closed.
